test_suite: Acha Direct - E-Commerce Chatbot FAQ Test Script
description: Automated test cases for the Acha Direct chatbot covering FAQ topics and product catalog queries.

test_cases.description: User asks how to contact Acha
test_cases.user_input: How can I contact you?
test_cases.expected_response_contains: You can reach Acha by email at sales@achadirect.com
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response includes email address and reply time

test_cases.description: Non-English speaker asks about language support
test_cases.user_input: Je ne parle pas anglais. Pouvez-vous m'aider?
test_cases.expected_response_contains: our team also speaks German, Spanish, French, and Thai
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response acknowledges multilingual support

test_cases.description: User asks about support languages
test_cases.user_input: Do you support other languages besides English?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response mentions available languages

test_cases.description: User asks about product quality
test_cases.user_input: Are your piercing products high quality?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response affirms strict quality standards

test_cases.description: User asks about surgical steel products
test_cases.user_input: Are your 316L surgical steel items body-safe?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response addresses material safety

test_cases.description: User asks about sterilization process
test_cases.user_input: How do you sterilize your piercing tools?
test_cases.expected_response_contains: EO (ethylene oxide) gas at 55°C for 12 hours
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response includes sterilization method and temperature

test_cases.description: User asks about minimum order value
test_cases.user_input: What is your minimum order amount?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response includes all three minimum order tiers

test_cases.description: User wants to add items after checkout
test_cases.user_input: I already placed an order. Can I add more items?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response explains how to add items via email

test_cases.description: User asks about custom jewelry
test_cases.user_input: Can I order custom-made jewelry?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response invites user to email for custom requests

test_cases.description: User asks about minimum order (edge case - showroom)
test_cases.user_input: What is the minimum if I visit your showroom?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response includes showroom minimum of 5,000 Baht

test_cases.description: User asks about VAT
test_cases.user_input: Do your prices include VAT or taxes?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response clarifies prices exclude VAT and taxes

test_cases.description: User asks about bulk discounts
test_cases.user_input: Do you offer discounts for large orders?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response lists discount tiers correctly

test_cases.description: User asks about currency display
test_cases.user_input: Can I see prices in Euros?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response guides user to the currency selector on the website

test_cases.description: Product price verification - in stock item
test_cases.user_input: How much does the PVD plated 316L surgical steel helix or eyebrow barbell, 1.2 cost?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response returns correct price of USD 3.67 for SKU BBERT23-F02B01

test_cases.description: User asks about payment methods
test_cases.user_input: What payment methods do you accept?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response lists all accepted payment methods

test_cases.description: User asks about payment for large orders
test_cases.user_input: I want to place an order for USD 5,000. How do I pay?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response recommends Bank Transfer for orders over USD 3,000

test_cases.description: User asks about PayPal for small order
test_cases.user_input: Can I pay with PayPal for a $200 order?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response confirms PayPal is available for orders under USD 3,000

test_cases.description: User asks about shipping cost and time
test_cases.user_input: How much does shipping cost and how long will it take?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response includes carrier names, timeframe, and cost estimate

test_cases.description: User asks about free shipping threshold
test_cases.user_input: When do I get free shipping?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response states free shipping is available on orders over USD 350

test_cases.description: User asks about Incoterms
test_cases.user_input: What are your shipping Incoterms?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response states CIF Incoterm and explains responsibility split

test_cases.description: User asks about lost package
test_cases.user_input: What happens if my package is lost in transit?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response confirms full insurance and replacement policy

test_cases.description: User asks about import taxes
test_cases.user_input: Will I have to pay import taxes?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response clarifies import taxes are the customer's responsibility

test_cases.description: User asks what happens if customs refuses the package
test_cases.user_input: What if customs refuses my shipment?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response states all associated costs are customer's responsibility

test_cases.description: User asks about money-back guarantee
test_cases.user_input: Do you offer a money-back guarantee?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response confirms 30-day money-back guarantee

test_cases.description: User received defective products
test_cases.user_input: Some of the items I received are damaged. What can I do?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response explains partial refund process for defective items

test_cases.description: User asks about full refund
test_cases.user_input: Can I get a full refund if I'm not happy?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response outlines refund conditions clearly

test_cases.description: User asks about samples
test_cases.user_input: Can I get samples before placing a bulk order?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response confirms free samples available for qualified customers

test_cases.description: User searches for an in-stock product by SKU
test_cases.user_input: Is SKU APGVV-D17000 available?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response confirms APGVV-D17000 is in stock

test_cases.description: User searches for an out-of-stock product
test_cases.user_input: Can I order SKU BBLS7-000000?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response informs user that BBLS7-000000 is out of stock and presents alternatives

test_cases.description: User asks about piercing tools / needles
test_cases.user_input: Do you sell piercing needles?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response confirms needle availability and mentions sterilization/labeling

test_cases.description: User asks about displays and boards
test_cases.user_input: Do you have display boards for jewelry?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response describes available display options

test_cases.description: User cannot find a specific size or color
test_cases.user_input: I can't find a 10mm gauge nose ring in blue. Do you have it?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response directs user to Sales Team for custom size/color requests

test_cases.description: User asks about a specific product price
test_cases.user_input: What is the price for Flexible acrylic labret, 1.2mm (16g) with 3mm UV ball?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response returns correct price USD 0.14 for SKU ALBEVB-F04A20

test_cases.description: User asks about tongue barbells
test_cases.user_input: Do you have acrylic tongue barbells in 14g?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response returns matching 14g acrylic tongue barbell products

test_cases.description: User asks for references
test_cases.user_input: Can you provide references from customers in my country?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response confirms references are available upon request

test_cases.description: User asks for product images without watermark
test_cases.user_input: Can I get product photos without your watermark for my website?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Response confirms watermark-free images available on request

test_cases.description: User inputs a completely off-topic question
test_cases.user_input: What is the weather like in Bangkok today?
test_cases.expected_response_behavior: Politely redirect to jewelry/piercing topics or offer human support
test_cases.pass_criteria: Chatbot does not answer off-topic question and redirects appropriately

test_cases.description: User sends empty message
test_cases.expected_response_behavior: Prompt user to type a question
test_cases.pass_criteria: Chatbot handles empty input gracefully without crashing

test_cases.description: User sends a non-existent SKU
test_cases.user_input: Do you have SKU XYZ-99999?
test_cases.expected_response_behavior: Inform user the SKU was not found and offer alternatives or contact info
test_cases.pass_criteria: Chatbot returns a 'not found' message without error

test_cases.description: User sends a question with typos
test_cases.user_input: Wht is yor minmum ordeer?
test_cases.pass_criteria: Chatbot correctly interprets typo-ridden question about minimum order

test_cases.description: User sends a very long message
test_cases.user_input: I am a jewelry retailer from Germany and I am interested in purchasing a large variety of piercing jewelry including barbells, rings, tunnels, and other items. I want to know everything about your pricing, discounts, shipping, payment options, and whether you can provide samples before I commit to a full order. Also, what is your return policy?
test_cases.expected_response_behavior: Address multiple topics: pricing, discounts, shipping, payment, samples, returns
test_cases.pass_criteria: Chatbot handles multi-intent query and covers at least 3 of the topics

product_sample_reference.description: Sample products used in test cases for validation

in_stock_samples.description: PVD plated 316L surgical steel helix or eyebrow barbell, 1.2mm (16g) with two 3m
Black acrylic double flared plug with skull logo in tattoo art design
Flexible acrylic labret, 1.2mm (16g) with 3mm UV ball
316L surgical steel tongue barbell, 1.6mm (14g) with a 5mm jewel ball on top and
Annealed 316L surgical steel fixed bead ring, 1.6mm (14g) with a 4mm ball

out_of_stock_samples.description: Black PVD plated 316L surgical steel tongue barbell, 1.6mm (14g) with an 8mm rou
PVD plated 316L surgical steel tongue barbell, 1.6mm (14g) with a top 6mm bezel
316L surgical steel tongue barbell, 1.6mm (14g) with a 6mm starship crystal ball
